backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, app creation CRUD operations, sharing/unsharing, and admin controls with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (with 'items' map) into the new actor state (with 'appCreations' map) during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features (textarea text visibility fix and app creation flow fix) to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing a JSON object with one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the frontend codebase structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, etc.) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting charset, viewport, light color-scheme meta, and mounting the React root div with the main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for BuilderPage, MyCreationsPage, CreationViewerPage, SharedViewerPage, and DownloadedCreationViewerPage inside an AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity that clears the React Query cache on logout and handles already-authenticated edge cases.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time profile setup that collects a display name, validates it, and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation with inline error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: A route guard component that shows a loading spinner during initialization, a branded sign-in card with Internet Identity login when unauthenticated, or renders children when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/download/Android: A dialog presenting two Android export options—recommended HTML export and an advanced Android Studio WebView project setup—with corresponding action buttons.
frontend/src/components/download/Downloa: A post-download confirmation dialog that displays format-specific success messaging (HTML, JSON, or Android) along with the downloaded filename and optional 'Open in App' action.
The main layout wrapper providing a sticky header with logo, user avatar, and login button, a bottom mobile nav bar, and a profile setup modal triggered when a new authenticated user has no profile.
frontend/src/components/library/Creation: A list item component for a saved creation that displays its type icon, title, and date, and provides actions (open, share/unshare, download as HTML, delete) via a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/preview/Creation: A thin dispatcher component that renders the appropriate runtime component (App, Website, Chatbot, Image, or Game) based on the creation type prop.
frontend/src/components/runtime/AppRunti: A task manager runtime component that renders a filterable to-do list with progress tracking, or delegates to CalculatorRuntime if appKind is 'calculator'.
frontend/src/components/runtime/Calculat: A calculator runtime component supporting basic and scientific modes, with button-driven expression input and safe math evaluation.
frontend/src/components/runtime/ChatbotR: A chatbot UI runtime that simulates bot responses based on keyword triggers, displaying a scrollable message thread with typing indicator.
frontend/src/components/runtime/GameRunt: A 2D canvas-based game runtime supporting keyboard and pointer input, with player movement, target spawning, shooting, and game state management.
frontend/src/components/runtime/ImageRun: A display-only runtime that renders an image placeholder using an emoji, gradient colors, title, caption, and style metadata.
frontend/src/components/runtime/WebsiteR: A website preview runtime that renders a multi-page site with browser chrome, navigation tabs, and section-based page content.
frontend/src/components/system/AsyncStat: A utility component that displays a destructive alert with an optional retry button when an error string is provided.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React class component that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with options to navigate to the builder or reload the page. Supports a custom fallback render prop.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerHea: Header action buttons for a creation viewer, providing share/unshare, HTML export/download, and delete functionality for an AppCreation item.
frontend/src/generation/detectGameKind.t: Detects the game kind (shooter, runner, puzzle, catch, space) from a prompt string using weighted keyword scoring, returning the kind, confidence level, and reason.
frontend/src/generation/gameSchema.ts: Normalizes and validates raw game data objects against a typed GameData schema, filling in defaults for any missing or invalid fields.
frontend/src/generation/gameTemplates.ts: Defines preset GameTemplate configurations for each game kind (runner, shooter, catch, puzzle, space) and exports a function to retrieve the appropriate template.
frontend/src/generation/templates.ts: Generates mock creation data from a prompt and creation type (app, website, chatbot, image, game), dispatching to type-specific generator functions with simulated async delay.
frontend/src/generation/types.ts: Defines core TypeScript types for the generation module, including CreationType, CreationDraft, AppData, and the detailed GameData interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasFit.ts: A React hook that resizes a canvas element to fit its container while maintaining a 4:3 aspect ratio, accounting for device pixel ratio, and provides a utility to map pointer coordinates to canvas space.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: A hook that combines Internet Identity authentication state with the caller's user profile query, exposing authentication status, principal, display name, and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including fetching/saving user profiles, generating/updating app creations, and listing or retrieving shared creations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a light-mode design token system using CSS custom properties for colors, shadows, radii, and sidebar theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: A page where authenticated users select a creation type (game, website, chatbot, etc.), enter a prompt, and trigger AI-based generation that saves the result and navigates to the creation viewer.
frontend/src/pages/CreationViewerPage.ts: A page that loads and displays a specific app creation by ID, showing a preview with header actions, and handling loading, error, and missing-content states.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadedCreationVie: A page that reads a previously downloaded creation from sessionStorage and displays it using CreationPreview, with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MyCreationsPage.tsx: A protected page that lists the authenticated user's creations in a responsive grid, with skeleton loading, error retry, and an empty state with a create CTA.
frontend/src/pages/SharedViewerPage.tsx: A public viewer page that fetches a shared creation by ID and renders it with a type badge and CreationPreview, handling loading, error, and parse-failure states.
frontend/src/services/errors.ts: Exports a normalizeError utility that maps known Error message patterns (auth, network, parsing, download, etc.) to user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides a downloadCreation function supporting JSON, HTML, and Android export formats, triggering browser downloads and storing JSON exports in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/exportAndroidProjectZ: Exports a placeholder exportAndroidProjectZip function that returns a Blob containing a plain-text guide with step-by-step Android Studio setup instructions instead of an actual ZIP.
frontend/src/utils/exportCreationHtml.ts: Exports a CreationDraft to a self-contained HTML string, generating type-specific body content, styles, and scripts for apps, websites, chatbots, images, and games.
frontend/src/utils/exportedGameRuntime.t: Generates the JavaScript runtime script and styles for an exported game, implementing a canvas-based game loop with player movement, target spawning, collision detection, and HUD updates driven by GameData.
frontend/src/utils/safeMathEval.ts: Implements a safe math expression evaluator using tokenization and the shunting-yard algorithm, supporting basic operators, functions (sin, cos, sqrt, etc.), and constants without using eval or Function.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Provides utilities to generate a shareable hash-based URL for a creation ID and copy it to the clipboard, with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, CSS-variable-based color tokens, border radii, shadows, and animations, with dark mode via class and the animate/typography plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state, recording two known issues (broken app creation flow and invisible prompt input text) as fix requests with associated feature IDs and requirements.
